attributes.title: Joseph Balderamma
attributes.twitter: '''Joseph Balderrama''' is an actor. He has appeared in television series such as ''The Bill'', ''The Omid Djalili Show'', ''Holby City'', ''Episodes'', ''Borgia'' and ''Not Going Out'', films such as ''AVP: Alien vs. Predator'', ''Alien Autopsy'', ''I Want Candy'' and ''Jack and Jill'' and video games such as ''Lego Batman 2: DC Super Heroes'' and ''007 Legends''.In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Cotter.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
